Properties.ProtectedString:
--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
firesound=waitfor(sp,"FireSound") handle=waitfor(sp,"Handle") sound=waitfor(handle,"FireSound")
firesound.Changed:connect(function() sound:Play() end)

--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
firerate=1.25 range=600 power=300 rate=1/30 barreloffset=Vector3.new(0,0,-1.5) windvec=Vector3.new(2,-1,1).unit
debris=game:GetService("Debris") equipped=false check=true
function waitfor(parent,name) while parent:FindFirstChild(name)==nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(name) end
local storeWeld=waitfor(sp,"BoltWeld") local firesound=waitfor(sp,"FireSound")
function checkintangible(hit) if hit and hit~=nil then if hit:IsDescendantOf(sp.Parent) or hit.Transparency>.8 or hit.Name=="Handle" or string.lower(string.sub(hit.Name,1,6))=="effect" or hit.Name=="Bullet" or hit.Name=="Laser" or string.lower(hit.Name)=="water" or hit.Name=="Rail" or hit.Name=="Arrow" then return true end end return false end
function castray(startpos,vec,length,ignore,delayifhit) local hit,endpos2=game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startpos,vec*length),ignore) if hit~=nil then if checkintangible(hit) then if delayifhit then wait() end hit,endpos2=castray(endpos2+(vec*.01),vec,length-((startpos-endpos2).magnitude),ignore,delayifhit) end end return hit,endpos2 end
function drawbeam(beamstart,beamend,clr,fadedelay) local dist=(beamstart-beamend).magnitude local laser=Instance.new("Part") laser.Name="Effect" laser.Anchored=true laser.CanCollide=false laser.Shape="Block" laser.formFactor="Custom" laser.Size=Vector3.new(.2,.2,.2) laser.Transparency=5 laser.Material=Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked=true laser.TopSurface=0 laser.BottomSurface=0 laser.BrickColor=clr laser.CFrame=CFrame.new(beamend,beamstart)*CFrame.new(0,0,-dist/2)*CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,dist*5,1) m.Parent=laser debris:AddItem(laser,fadedelay*3) laser.Parent=game.Workspace
local frames=math.floor(fadedelay/rate) for frame=1,frames do wait(rate) local percent=frame/frames laser.CFrame=laser.CFrame+windvec*rate laser.Transparency=.5+(percent*.5) end wait(1) laser:remove() end
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true if mouse~=nil then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local hu=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local he=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if check and hu and hu.Health>0 and t and he then check=false
local startpos=he.Position local fakestartpos=(sp.Handle.CFrame*CFrame.new(barreloffset)).p local vec=(mouse.Hit.p-startpos).unit
local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Arrow" p.BrickColor=BrickColor.new("Black") p.CanCollide=true p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.formFactor="Custom" p.Size=Vector3.new(.2,.2,2) local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=95920149" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=95920067" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=p
local c=Instance.new("ObjectValue") c.Name="creator" c.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer c.Parent=p
local sound=Instance.new("Sound") sound.SoundId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=16211030" sound.Volume=1 sound.Parent=p sound:Play()
local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=p s.Disabled=false
local hit,endpos=castray(startpos,vec,range,sp.Parent,false) local fakevec=(endpos-fakestartpos).unit if hit~=nil then local newcf=CFrame.new(endpos,endpos+fakevec)*CFrame.new(0,0,.5) p.CFrame=newcf local w=Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0=hit w.Part1=p w.C0=hit.CFrame:inverse()*newcf w.C1=newcf:inverse()*newcf w.Parent=p else p.CFrame=CFrame.new(endpos,endpos+fakevec) p.Velocity=fakevec*power p.Parent=game.Workspace end
debris:AddItem(p,20) p.Parent=game.Workspace
delay(0,function() drawbeam(fakestartpos,endpos,BrickColor.new("Institutional white"),.25) end)
firesound.Value=not firesound.Value local shoulder=t:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if shoulder~=nil then shoulder.CurrentAngle=2 end if sp:FindFirstChild("Effect") then sp.Effect.Transparency=1 end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(firerate) if sp:FindFirstChild("Effect") then sp.Effect.Transparency=0 end mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" check=true end end) end if storeWeld then storeWeld.Parent=sp end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=36
wait(.1)
local weld=sp:FindFirstChild("Weld") if weld~=nil then if weld.Part0~=nil then hit=weld.Part0 local sound=sp:FindFirstChild("Sound") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end local ct=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") if ct.Value~=nil and ct.Value.Character~=nil then if hit.Parent~=ct.Value.Character and hit.Name~="Handle" and hit.Name~="Effect" then local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if h~=nil and t~=nil and h.Health>0 then for i,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end ct:clone().Parent=h h:TakeDamage(damage) if h.Health<=0 then for i,v in ipairs(h.Parent:GetChildren()) do if v.className=="Shirt" or v.className=="Pants" or v.className=="CharacterMesh" then v:remove() end end local head=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Head") if head~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(head:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36869983" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36869975" m.Scale=Vector3.new(.95,.9,.95) m.Parent=head end local t=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if t~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(t:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780113" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780292" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=t end local la=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if la~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(la:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780032" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780292" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=la end local ra=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if ra~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(ra:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780156" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780292" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=ra end local ll=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Left Leg") if ll~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(ll:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780079" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780292" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=ll end local rl=h.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Leg") if rl~=nil then for i,v in ipairs(rl:GetChildren()) do v:remove() end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780195" m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=36780292" m.Scale=Vector3.new(1,1,1) m.Parent=rl end end end end end end end
